topic.title: A promise of prompt courteous service.

body.p: With factory-trained technicians in nearly every major city in North Americas, PDI is able to respond within four hours of a call and provide on-site assistance in emergency down time situations.
PDI provides telephone support 24 hours a day, 7 days a week direct line to Service (800-225-4838).
Work can be performed on the STS or STS/PDU System on weekends, nights or holidays. (Consult factory for details.)
